item.title: Lost & Found: Remembering the 20th Century Hotel & Casino – A Vintage Las Vegas Flash
item.description:
A Brief, Bright Spark: The 20th Century Hotel & Casino

The Las Vegas Strip is known for its constant evolution, a relentless churn of new resorts and themed experiences. But sometimes, the most fascinating stories are those of places that burned brightly, but didn’t last. The 20th Century Hotel & Casino, a short-lived property on Tropicana Avenue between 1977 and 1979, is a perfect example. Its existence – just under two years – speaks volumes about the era and the ever-present gamble inherent in the Vegas dream.
